movies.title: Melissa P.
movies.plot: Melissa lives with her mother and her grandmother in Sicily. She has a close relationship with her grandmother, a heavy smoker, who seems to be the only person in the world who understands Melissa. Melissa's father lives in another country. One day Melissa and her friend go to a party at a school friend's home. While there, Melissa meets Daniele, a boy from the school, and has her first sexual experience. The experience is far from being what Melissa always has dreamed it would be, because Daniele forces her and later forgets her. However, Melissa has fallen in love with Daniele. Back at school, when Melissa tries to get Daniele's attention, he barely remembers her. He takes advantage of Melissa's feelings for him, convincing her to have sex with him whenever he wants. When Melissa discovers Daniele's true motivations, she takes revenge by having even wilder sexual experiences with him and other boys. She even begins keeping a diary to document her sexual experiences. Melissa's mother...
movies.simplePlot: An adolescent girl, living with her mother and her grandmother, will have her first sexual experiences in a heavy and excessive way.

biography.bio: She began acting in 2002, when film director Manuel Martin Cuenca chose her from 3000 girls to be the lead actress in his film "The Bolshevik's Weakness". One year later, Maria's work impressed both the audience and the Spanish Film Academy, who awarded her with the Goya for Best Newcomer. Since then she has been working in Spain, Italy, UK, US, Mexico, Venezuela...
biography.name: María Valverde

biography.bio: Letizia Ciampa was born on August 20, 1986 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is known for her work on Melissa P. (2005), Winx Club, l'aventure magique 3D (2010) and Winx Club: le secret du royaume perdu (2007).
biography.name: Letizia Ciampa

biography.bio: Primo Reggiani was born on November 5, 1983 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Primo Nunzio Jasis Reggiani. He is an actor, known for Melissa P. (2005), Encore un baiser (2010) and Scrivilo sui muri (2007).
biography.name: Primo Reggiani

biography.bio: Fabrizia Sacchi was born on February 10, 1971 in Naples, Campania, Italy. She is an actress and producer, known for La prima cosa bella (2010), Je voyage seule (2013) and Paz! (2002).
biography.name: Fabrizia Sacchi

biography.bio: Geraldine Leigh Chaplin was born in Santa Monica, California, to Oona Chaplin (née O'Neill) and legendary entertainer Charles Chaplin (A.K.A. Charlie Chaplin). She is a granddaughter of playwright Eugene O'Neill and a great-granddaughter of stage actor James O'Neill. She attended the Royal Ballet Academy in London. She was discovered by David Lean when she was dancing in Paris, which led to her role in Doctor Zhivago (1965). She has two children, Shane and Oona Chaplin.
biography.name: Geraldine Chaplin

biography.bio: Nilo Zimmerman was born on July 22, 1986 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Nilo Mur Zimmermann. He is known for his work on Héctor (2004), Melissa P. (2005) and 3some (2009).
biography.name: Nilo Zimmerman

biography.bio: Claudio Santamaria was born on July 22, 1974 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor, known for Casino Royale (2006), They Call Me Jeeg (2015) and Diaz: Un crime d'état (2012).
biography.name: Claudio Santamaria

biography.bio: Carlo Antonelli was born on January 15, 1965 in Novi Ligure, Piedmont, Italy. He is a producer and actor, known for Amore (2009), Melissa P. (2005) and Part deux (2007).
biography.name: Carlo Antonelli

biography.bio: Pier Giorgio Bellocchio was born as Piergiorgio Giorgio Bellocchio. He is an actor and producer, known for Vincere (2009), Good Morning, Night (2003) and The Nanny (1999).
biography.name: Pier Giorgio Bellocchio

biography.bio: Marcello Mazzarella was born in Erice, Sicily, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Placido Rizzotto (2000), La Sicilienne (2008) and Marcel Proust's Time Regained (1999).
biography.name: Marcello Mazzarella

biography.bio: Elio Germano was born on September 25, 1980 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Mon frère est fils unique (2007), A Magnificent Haunting (2012) and Suburra (2015).
biography.name: Elio Germano

biography.bio: Alba Rohrwacher was born on February 27, 1979 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy as Alba Caterina Rohrwacher. She is known for her work on Amore (2009), Les merveilles (2014) and La solitude des nombres premiers (2010).
biography.name: Alba Rohrwacher

biography.bio: Davide Pasti is an actor and director, known for Melissa P. (2005), Giovani (2002) and The Dog Trial (2011).
biography.name: Davide Pasti

biography.bio: Francesca Madaro is an actress, known for Melissa P. (2005).
biography.name: Francesca Madaro

biography.bio: Esmeralda Prete is an actress, known for Melissa P. (2005).
biography.name: Esmeralda Prete

awards.award: Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists 2006
